name: CRTX - A Psychological Horror Puzzle Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.0 GHz or Ryzen 3xxx
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (recent generation)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1070 or better 6GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Imagine Squid Game and Portal having a child. That's basically CRTX (pronounced cortex). Be prepared for an oppressive atmosphere with dark humor, a few horror elements and a story that digs deep inside your mind...
